item.title: Flight Crew Auxiliary Heat Systems – (Foot and Shoulder)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated system is deactivated.

note.para: Any portion which is operative may be used.

placard.para: Placard as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Pull and collar the circuit breaker on (P34 or P37 panels) for the associated inoperative heater.
